OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

io-page-xen

  • version 0.1.0
  • 0.9.9
Tags org:mirage and org:xapi-project
Maintainer anil@recoil.org
Dependencies ocamlfind & cstruct >= 0.8.1
Last update Mar 24, 2014
Source https://github.com/mirage/io-page/archive/0.1.0.tar.gz
e1558627dd05d438befa14165f7df896

Allocate OS memory pages suitable for aligned I/O

Dependencies
cstruct ( >= 0.8.1 )
ocamlfind
Required by
mirage
mirage-block-xen
mirage-net-xen
